article.headline: Hampton 58, Fordham 48
article.story: NEW YORK -- Darrion Pellum scored 19 points and Hampton beat Fordham 58-48 on Friday night. The Pirates (2-1) held a 42-40 lead with 8:17 left in the second half before going on an 11-1 run that spanned about six minutes. Pellum, who went 8-for-15 from the floor, knocked down his only 3-pointer of the game with 2:19 left to give Hampton a 53-41 lead. The Rams (1-2) were unable to come closer than 10 points the rest of the way against the Pirates, who held Fordham to 32 percent shooting from the field and forced them into 21 turnovers. The Pirates took advantage of Fordham, scoring 22 points off its turnovers. Hampton's Charles Funches scored 12 points and grabbed eight rebounds, while Kwame Morgan added had 12 points. Chris Gaston led Fordham with 17 points and 14 rebounds -- six offensive -- but had six turnovers. Alberto Estwick had 19 points and nine rebounds.

statistics.name: points
statistics.description: The number of points scored.

statistics.description: Field Goal makes and attempts.

statistics.description: Free Throw makes and attempts.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.name: minutes
statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.name: assistTurnoverRatio
statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover
